item.title: Node-RED Docker Images
item.description: This week, I’ve been helping create and publish official Docker images for the Node-RED project. Users can start Node-RED instances from these images using the following command. docker run -it -p 1880:1880 nodered/node-red-docker Node-RED is now publishing the following images to Docker Hub for each new release. latest - uses official Node.JS v4 base image. slim - uses Alpine Linux base image. rpi - uses RPi-compatible base image. When a new version is released on NPM, an automated CI service will build, test and publish new images with the updated version tags.
